headline: FirstEnergy Corp. Declares Increased Quarterly Common Stock Dividend of $0.445 Per Share
summary: The Board of Directors of FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) today declared a quarterly dividend of $0.445 per share of outstanding common stock payable June 1, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on May 7, 2025.
